root: ^Welcome to the Castle Construction Company Headquarters

Good: ^We are teaching the Construction Project Management course here.
Bad: ^OK, do you know what department you need to go to?
^Or, you can check with the receptionist at the front desk.
^check a the front desk when you get inside.
Repeat: ^I am sorry, pleae repeat that again.
